document.bingtitle: Pittsford Ice Cream & Dessert Shops | Urbanspoon
document.description: It's not just about the ice cream ... Only odd thing - is this is not a fast food restaurant, they are making your order ... props for the food, but you would expect ...

Pittsford, Desserts/Ice Cream
May 19, 2010 The Cheesecake Factory By Zagat 'Humongous portions and humongous lines' characterize this American... Full review 4.5/5.0 Ben&Jerry's By Citysearch It's not just about the ice cream. Ben and Jerry, two childhood friends from Vermont, built their empire on a great... Full review 4.0/5.0 Cold Stone Creamery By Citysearch Crowds of couples, teenagers and parents with toddlers press up against the long refrigerated display case at this... Full review
Diner reviews
Pittsford, Desserts/Ice Cream
June 20, 2012 Ben&Jerry's Ben&Jerry's by blondyskigirl ( 2 reviews ) I would always suggest Ben&Jerry’s for ice cream around Pittsford. They have all different flavors and their ice cream is always delicious. If you are a fan of sundaes, I would definitely recommend the Cookie Cookie Sundae. It has cookies, hot fudge and ice cream! The staff at Ben&Jerry’s in Pittsford is always friendly – and who doesn’t love ice cream?! June 7, 2012 Bill Wahl's Ice Cream&Yogurt Yum yum yum by Skip ( 51 reviews ) There is nothing more I can say. Bring the whole family and enjoy the made on site ice cream. Puts the top brands to shame. May 21, 2012 Ben&Jerry's Great Options by bbzdick ( 15 reviews ) They had great options available, as they do in the stores, and then some! Almost wasn't able to choose because they all looked and sounded so great. Had nice quick service without a long wait in line as you can experience at some ice cream joints. This will be my new go to summer ice cream place, try it!
